  • Method Details

    • beforeProcessLaserOnBlock

      public void beforeProcessLaserOnBlock(LaserContext ctx, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState oldState, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, ILaserProcessor processor)
      Description copied from interface: ILaserAttachment
      beforeProcessLaserOnBlock will be invoked before the laser is going to process a block. You can invoke LaserContext.cancel() to cancel further processing, and LaserContext.getHitResult() will return the HitResult.
      Specified by:
      beforeProcessLaserOnBlock in interface ILaserAttachment
      Parameters:
      ctx - The LaserContext
      oldState - The BlockState of the hitting block
      pos - The position of the hitting block
      processor - The processor, will never be null
      See Also:
      • ILaserAttachment.afterProcessLaserOnBlock(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState,net.minecraft.core.BlockPos)
      • LaserContext.cancel()
      • LaserContext.getHitResult()
      • ILaserProcessor.isEndPoint()

    • afterMergeLaser

      public void afterMergeLaser(LaserContext ctx, LaserContext target, LaserProperties targetProps)
      Description copied from interface: ILaserAttachment
      afterMergeLaser will be invoked after the attached laser is merged to another. If needed, attachment can attach itself to the target laser in this method.
      Specified by:
      afterMergeLaser in interface ILaserAttachment
      Parameters:
      ctx - The attached LaserContext
      target - The LaserContext which being merged to
      targetProps - The target laser's LaserProperties
      See Also:
      • ILaserAttachment.beforeMergeLaser(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext,net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext)
